name: bs.to - Modern Series
description: Dark and Modern Style for bs.to Still work in progress. Till now, there is only a version available that requires Tampermonkey for Chrome or Greasemonkey for Firefox. It's used to move some Elements to fit the Style. Tamper/Grease Script
additional_info:
Changelog
v.1.2 - Fixed Style for latest bs.to update.
v.1.1 - Fixed some margin/padding bugs. Also fixed some bugs with the contrast.
        Added alternative Smileys for the Shoutbox. Removed the white Background.
v.1.0 - First Release
